name: Dara Bubamara
description: '''Radojka Adžić''' ({{lang-sr-cyr|Радојка Аџић}}; born 21 May 1976), better known as '''Dara Bubamara''' ({{literal translation|[[Dara]] the [[Ladybug]]}}), is a [[Serbia]]n singer from [[Novi Sad]]. She came to prominence as a member of the Dara Bubamara Show Band. Adžić subsequently pursued a solo career in 1995 and has released twelve studio albums.
